verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: Well, you see him who belies the Requital.
verse.verse_2: Then he is the one who drives away the orphan.
verse.verse_3: And does not urge the feeding of the poor.
verse.verse_4: Then woe to those prayer performers.
verse.verse_5: Who are heedless of their prayers?
verse.verse_6: Those who make a Show of it.
verse.verse_7: And refuse to give articles of use.
